date: "`r Sys.time()`"

The purpose of this listing is to help as I (slowly) move code from
unvectorized form to vectorized form.

```{r}
library(oce)
files <- list.files(".", ".ad2cp")
for (file in files) {
    cat(file, "\n")
    print(read.oce(file, which="?"))
}
```
